name: Project Carnevil (itch)
description:
Project ‘Carnevil’ is an atmospheric VR carnival game set in an abandoned carnival fair. The player will take control of a person that finds themselves exploring the carnival uncovering the mysterious disappearing that have occurred. This is the Capstone project of the class of 2022 Game Development Majors. A VR horror game focused on putting together the skills the team learned during their time in Drury University.

Playing instructions:

  • Plug in your headset and make sure its companion software is running
  • Unzip the game and launch it
